data.name: CrashDesc
data.value: The application has terminated with an unhandled exception: {0}[{1}]. Would you like to reset the application settings to factory default?

data.name: Feat_Desc_NeedsConversion
data.value: This feature was saved before 1.2. It needs to be manually converted.

data.name: Generic_No_Inventory_Weight_Desc
data.value: The inventory of this sheet has 0 as all parameters (current weight/midpoint weight/max weight)! Do you want to recalculate it?

data.name: Generic_OldSave_Pass1
data.value: An old or incompatible save file was loaded. Due to the way stat calculations were changed it is recommended to do a stat rebuild. Do the rebuild?

data.name: Generic_OldSave_Pass2
data.value: An old or incompatible save file was loaded. Due to general potential save partial or full incompatibility it is recommended to override the file. Save now?

data.name: Generic_SaveError_Description
data.value: Couldn't save the sheet to the previous location: {0}, {1}. Press OK to select a different file to save to. Press Cancel to cancel the save alltogether.

data.name: Generic_Unsaved_Description
data.value: There are unsaved changes. Do you want to save the file before resetting it? Press Yes to save the file and reset it. Press No to discard all changes and reset it. Press Cancel to abort the operation

data.name: ItemIndex_Types_Desc
data.value: Enter the types to include Separate multiple types by a new line

data.name: Marketplace_Delete_Desc
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this script? This action can't be reversed!

data.name: Marketplace_Error_Desc
data.value: A connection to the marketplace could not be established! Do you want to try again? Exception details:

data.name: Marketplace_Loading_Subtitle
data.value: This may take a few seconds...

data.name: Message_ContainerWithItems_Desc
data.value: You are deleting an item which contains other items in it! Do you want to delete them as well?

data.name: R20_ServerHelp
data.value: Server Help: Press the "Start server" button first. This will copy the client to your clipboard. Open the browser window, navigate to the game, make sure the game is running, press F12 on your keyboard, select the Console tab and press Ctrl+V into the console. On certain browsers you may need to do more actions.

data.name: Tooltip_Button_AdvancedRoll
data.value: Use the values above to construct a variable roll and throw it on R20.

data.name: Tooltip_Button_CopyFeat
data.value: Copy the selected Features to the clipboard

data.name: Tooltip_Button_CopyItem
data.value: Copy the selected items to the clipboard

data.name: Tooltip_Button_CopyServer
data.value: Copy the code driving the server to the clipboard. The code will need to be pasted into a console of your browser to start. See the Info/About section of the app for a github link.

data.name: Tooltip_Button_CopyThisMacro
data.value: Copy this macro to the Clipboard

data.name: Tooltip_Button_EditFeatImage
data.value: Select an image for this Feat

data.name: Tooltip_Button_EditItemImage
data.value: Select an image for this Item

data.name: Tooltip_Button_EditSpellImage
data.value: Select an image for this Spell

data.name: Tooltip_Button_Feat2Max
data.value: Set the value of the feat to its maximum

data.name: Tooltip_Button_Feat2Zero
data.value: Set the value of the feat to 0

data.name: Tooltip_Button_FeatDecrement
data.value: Decrement the value of the feat by 1

data.name: Tooltip_Button_FeatIncrement
data.value: Increment the value of the feat by 1

data.name: Tooltip_Button_Log
data.value: Open the latest Roll20 log file.

data.name: Tooltip_Button_PasteFeat
data.value: Paste the clipboard contents as a Feature(s)

data.name: Tooltip_Button_PasteItem
data.value: Paste the clipboard contents as an Item(s)

data.name: Tooltip_Button_PasteMacro
data.value: Paste the contents of the clipboard as a Macro

data.name: Tooltip_Button_RecalculateStatModifiers
data.value: Reset all stat modifiers and calculate them based on profficiency and raw stat values. This action will remove all manually changed modifiers for skills and saves!

data.name: Tooltip_Button_RecalculateWeights
data.value: Recalculate all weights of the inventory. This includes the Item weights, as well as max1/max2 weights

data.name: Tooltip_Button_StartServer
data.value: Copies the server driving code into the clipboard, starts the local client and begins trying to establish a connection to the server.

data.name: Tooltip_Button_StopServer
data.value: Terminates the connection to the R20 server and stops the client. The server will shutdown.

data.name: Tooltip_Checkbox_AsMultipleRolls
data.value: Instructs Roll20 to not use a template and parse the roll as a simple chat command.
